start.1: cd ../repo && npm i && node fileToRun && echo 'node.js start successful'
cd ../repo && python fileToRun.py && echo 'python start successful'

compile.1: cd ../repo && javac fileToRun.java && echo 'java compile successful'

start.1: cd ../repo && java fileToRun.java && echo 'java start successful'

compile.1: cd ../repo && g++ fileToRun.cpp -o fileToRun.exe && echo 'c++ compile successful'
